Content:: Richard Abels FRHistS (born 1951) is professor emeritus of history at the United States Naval Academy.[1] Abels is a specialist in the military and political institutions of Anglo-Saxon England.[2] He was Elected Fellow of the Royal Historical Society (elected 1990).[3]  This biography of an American historian is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
